directions:
Mix tomatoes, basil, oregano, parsley and garlic in a bowl with immersion blender.

Heat olive oil and sauté bacon. 

Sauté onions, carrots, and celery, until soft.

Add meat, break apart and allow fluid to evaporate if any.

Add wine and deglaze and allow wine to evaporate.

Add tomato mixture and stir.

Pressure cook for 20 min.

Quick release and then simmer on low sauté setting until thickness is right.

Add heavy cream and parmesan.

html.directions:
Mix tomatoes, basil, oregano, parsley and garlic in a bowl with immersion blender.

Heat olive oil and sauté bacon.

Sauté onions, carrots, and celery, until soft.

Add meat, break apart and allow fluid to evaporate if any.

Add wine and deglaze and allow wine to evaporate.

Add tomato mixture and stir.

Pressure cook for 20 min.

Quick release and then simmer on low sauté setting until thickness is right.

Add heavy cream and parmesan.
html.ingredients:
• 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1-1/2 cups diced yellow onion
  • ½ cup diced carrots
  • 1/2 cup diced celery
  • 1 pound ground beef chuck
  • 1/2 pound ground pork
  • 4 ounces diced bacon
  • 4 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 tablespoons tomato paste
  • 1/2 cup dry red wine
  • 28 ounces of tomatoes
  • 1/2 cup Italian parsley
  • 1/2 cup basil
  • Fresh oregano
  • 1/4 cup heavy cream
  • parmesan cheese
  • pinch ground nutmeg
  • bay leaves
  • mirin
  • fish sauce
  • kosher salt and freshly-ground black pepper

Fresh oregano
1/4 cup heavy cream
parmesan cheese

bay leaves
mirin
fish sauce
kosher salt and freshly-ground black pepper
name: Bolognese Sauce
